medium: Silk, cotton, metallic thread; tapestry weave, knotting and wrapping
title: Hair ribbon (Cinta)
description: Elaborately decorated hair ribbon; designs formed with a variety of tapestry techniques, including interlocking, slit, eccentric weft; geometric and figurative motifs, birds, dancing women, rabbits; puffy pompoms on each end with looped and wrapped tassles emerging from the pompoms.
